data.oai_dc:dc: Information about the plate that contains the DNA sample.DNAplate_id: Numerical identifier (unique per row) ESTADO: State (of Mexico) where the accession was originally collected. DNA_plate: Plate where the DNA is stored in our facilities. DNA_well: Well within plate where the DNA is stored in our facilities. accesion: Unique key for accession.** - Technical description of columns - **Field Type Null Key Default ExtraDNAplate_id int(5) NO PRI NULL auto_incrementESTADO varchar(20) NO NULL DNA_plate int(2) NO NULL DNA_well varchar(3) NO NULL accesion varchar(10) YES NULL
